item.title: FT Most Read: Friday, October 25, 2024 at 1:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Trump takes lead over Harris on US economy in final FT poll
2. Reeves confirms change to UK fiscal rules to help fund £20bn of annual investment
3. [Opinion] How squeezing the rich through tax may backfire
4. How an ex-Goldman banker built a $10bn private credit ‘whale’ — and now may sell it
5. Putin bets on North Korean troops to retake Kursk from Ukraine
item.guid: FT Most Read: Friday, October 25, 2024 at 1:15 AM UTC
